events.message: I was involved in a car accident last night where another vehicle collided with mine, causing significant damage.
The claim has been categorized under auto accident due to the involvement of collision and vehicle damage.
An agent has been assigned to your claim to assist you throughout the process of vehicle repair and insurance evaluation.
Your claim for the auto accident has been acknowledged and entered into our system for further processing.
Please submit photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and repair estimates to proceed with your claim assessment.
All requested documents, including the accident police report and vehicle repair cost estimates, have been submitted for review.
An investigation has begun to assess the circumstances and extent of damage related to your auto accident claim.
The investigation into the car collision has been completed with findings supporting the claim.
We have proposed a settlement amount that covers the estimated costs for repairs and damages sustained in the accident.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the settlement proposal and the prompt handling of the auto accident claim.
Your claim has been approved based on the investigation results and submitted documentation for your vehicle accident.
The payment covering your car damage repair costs has been processed and issued to your nominated bank account.
Your auto accident insurance claim is now closed. Please contact us if you have any further questions or concerns.
